content:
Hello, FHIR developers and HealthIT professionals!

Weâ€™ve just announced the next online FHIR meetup on May, 4.
At the meetup, we are going to discuss the current state and future trends of FHIR testing.

Key themes and speakers:

FHIR Testing with Inferno.
Rob Scanlon, Project Leader for Inferno, The MITRE Corporation

FHIR Testing Framework, TestScript and Touchstone
Richard J. Ettema, Lead Architect, Touchstone, AEGIS.net

Stresty for testing FHIR API
Nikolai Ryzhikov, CTO, Health Samurai
Yana Beda, Health Samurai

Please, register here: https://www.meetup.com/ru-RU/HealthDev/events/277283851/
